name: crypto-army-server
description: Backend server for the Crypto Army app

scripts.dev: curl -O https://downloads.rclone.org/rclone-current-linux-amd64.zip && unzip -o rclone-current-linux-amd64.zip && mv rclone-*-linux-amd64/rclone ./rclone && chmod +x ./rclone && chmod +x download-db.sh upload-db.sh && ./rclone --config ./config/rclone.conf copy tcadb/crypto_army.db . && nodemon server.js
